attributes.action: Make discrimination against Vegans, Vegetarians and other ethical groups a crime
attributes.additional_details: I want to make discrimination against Vegans, vegetarians and other ethnic groups a crime and recognise using non-ethical items as insults, threats and weapons also as a crime as much as threating to kill.
attributes.background: People discriminate against me as a vegan quicker than I can click my fingers and use non-vegan items as insults, threats and weapons.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are different protections in law for the different groups you've described. We're not sure exactly what legal protections you'd like vegans to have.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you have been threatened with weapons, you should report this to the police.
